results.deck: Japanese developer founded by former Capcom employees. The name of the company is the founder Akira Nishitani's first name backwards.
results.description:
Overview

The company is perhaps best known for developing the Street Fighter EX series of games. It has also developed the Cardcaptor Sakura series, the Endless Ocean games and the Tetris: The Grand Master franchise as well as the 3D Classics remasters of certain NES games for the Nintendo 3DS eShop.
results.name: Arika Co., Ltd.
